amendment.description: Amendment sought to require mitigation measures, previously adopted in P.L. 111-11, to ensure that impacts to migratory birds, wildlife, and wetlands are minimized.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 234 (Roll no. 404).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Tsongas.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 234 (Roll no. 404).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
